title: Introduction à la conception de système mécatronique
text:
Conception et Innovation
         
         
             La vitesse n’a jamais tué personne. Se retrouver brusquement immobile, c’est ça qui vous tue. - Jeremy Clarkson, Top Gear Université de Lorraine
         
         
         
            Cours Magistraux            
            Guide de Travaux Dirigés

title: 1  Bienvenue
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.

1 + 1

[1] 2






Knuth, Donald E. 1984. “Literate Programming.” Comput. J. 27 (2): 97–111. https://doi.org/10.1093/comjnl/27.2.97.

title: 2  Summary
text:

title: Introduction à la conception de système mécatronique
text:
3 Contacting me
E-mail and Slack are the best ways to get in contact with me. I will try to respond to all course-related e-mails and Slack messages within 24 hours (really), but also remember that life can be busy and chaotic for everyone (including me!), so if I don’t respond right away, don’t worry!
